name: Survival of the Fittest (Mattia Di Meglio)
name_original: Survival of the Fittest (Mattia Di Meglio)
description:
It's a small prototype consisting  in 4 minigames made in pico8.

incipit: you're stranded on an island  in which nature reigns sovereign. You'll have to show it that you're stronger than her, because only the fittest can survive!
